dc:title: Statistical descriptors of GDP per capita combined with yearly averages of hours of sunshine per country
dc:description: Descriptors like min, max, median of GDP per capita for many countries from the 1960s up to 2019, combined with average yearly sunshine hours extrapolated from readings in some cities of those countries.
dc:creator: Filip Darmanovic (https://orcid.org/0000-0002-2239-1634)

columns.dc:description: The country's official name in English.
The ISO Aplpha-3 code for a country, in uppercase.
The minimum of all recorder GDP per Capita values
The maximum of all recorder GDP per Capita values
The year of the newest GDP per Capita data entry
The latest recorded GDP per capita entry
The average yearly sunshine hours, taken as average from different cities' readings.
